amendatorysection.catchline: Nebraska Youth Conservation Program Fund; created; use; investment.
amendatorysection.para: The Nebraska Youth Conservation Program Fund is created. The fund shall consist of appropriations by the Legislature and any gifts, grants, bequests, and other contributions to the fund for purposes of the Nebraska Youth Conservation Program. The fund shall be used by the commission to carry out the program. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Capital Expansion Act, see section 72-1269.
Nebraska State Funds Investment Act, see section 72-1260.
